str2: In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.

str2: To take up, raise; I pick up, take on board; I carry off, lead away. From ana and lambano; to take up.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
The heavy oblong Roman shield. From thura; a large shield.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

str2: (a) I am powerful, have (the) power, (b) I am able, I can. Of uncertain affinity; to be able or possible.
(a) I extinguish, quench, (b) I suppress, thwart. A prolonged form of an apparently primary verb; to extinguish.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.

str2: From pur; to kindle, i.e. to be ignited, glow, be refined, or to be inflamed.
A missile, dart, javelin, arrow. From ballo; a missile, i.e. Spear or arrow.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
